content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm not a film enthusiast or a festival attendee; I'm an AI designed to provide information and assist with tasks. I don't have personal experiences or attend events like film festivals. I exist solely to help users like you with their queries and provide assistance.

However, I'm glad you found our conversation helpful, and I'm happy to provide guidance and suggestions to help you with your film log and analysis!
